scripts.build_server: cd src/server && npm run build && cd ../..
scripts.start_server_watch: cd src/server && npm run start_dev_watch && cd ../..
scripts.start_server: cd src/server && npm run start_dev && cd ../..
scripts.debug_server: cd src/server && npm run debug_dev && cd ../..
scripts.test_server: cd src/server && npm run test && cd ../..
